about_the_game:
The Dream Machine is an award-winning point & click adventure game about exploring other people's dreams. It's built by hand using materials such as clay, cardboard & broccoli.

Delve into the minds of strangers and loved ones as you’re trying to save them from the dream machine. The Definitive Edition expands game with new story elements, new endings, new environments, enhanced graphics & improved sound.

Full game

This release contains all chapters – previously released episodically – including reworked ending chapters, plus new unexpected content.

World

Explore a creepy apartment complex and uncover the mysteries within. Get to know your neighbors and discover all their juicy secrets.

Story

Play as Victor Neff, the husband of a young expecting couple who've just moved into a new apartment. While trying to get settled in you discover that all is not as it seems in the quiet, unassuming apartment building...

Graphics

Wander around gorgeously detailed environments built using physical clay models and hand-crafted sets.

Puzzles

In order to progress you have to solve puzzles ranging from simple pushovers to fiendish brainteasers.

Music

A haunting original soundtrack weaves through the narrative, emphasizing the surreal atmosphere of the game.

Technology

The game's been painstakingly rebuilt from the ground up in a new engine.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: The Dream Machine - The Definitive Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) , Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
